HOME-PAGE.zoom-popup: At this time, our forester will plant the trees for you and you will be present via Zoom for the whole planting ceremony.
HOME-PAGE.md-title: Wishing you were in Israel, planting a tree?
HOME-PAGE.md-title2: You can still do it with us from home!
HOME-PAGE.md-title3: You at home and our forester at the Tree Planting Site.
HOME-PAGE.md-title4: Together we can plant via Zoom video conferencing.
HOME-PAGE.verse-para: When you come into the Land, and plant all kinds of treesâ€¦
HOME-PAGE.about-kkl3: How are you these days? Hopefully keeping safe and healthy in these difficult times.
HOME-PAGE.about-kkl4: The COVID-19 crisis keeps us apart physically, but we can still get together via video conferencing to continue planting trees in the Land of Israel. With the help of Zoom, we invite you to participate in a tree planting ceremony in the Tzora Forest in the foothills of Jerusalem, with us in the forest and you at home. You can plant as many trees as you wish in honor or in memory of your dear ones and invite family and friends to take part and record the event for posterity/as a memento.
HOME-PAGE.about-kkl5: Plantings will be held at your convenience, Sunday through Thursday, between 08:00 and 16:00 Israel time (IDT).
HOME-PAGE.about-kkl6: Personal tree certificates (30 words maximum) will be mailed to a given address.
HOME-PAGE.about-kkl8: We are excited for the opportunity to invite you to take part in this significant and singular experience for the benefit of the environment.
HOME-PAGE.about-kkl9: We hope that life will soon return to normal and that we can meet in person and welcome you to a Plant-a-Tree center in Israel.
HOME-PAGE.Testimonial1: I felt connected on a deeper level
HOME-PAGE.Testimonial2: Planting a tree is so symbolic of the continuity of life and future of Israel
HOME-PAGE.Testimonial3: This creates a connection with Israel and is a way of leaving a part of us here
HOME-PAGE.Testimonial4: Planting a tree in Israel thrills me every time
HOME-PAGE.button2: Roll up your sleeves and get your hands dirty

CHOOSE-AREA.michal-intro: Director of the tree planting department.
CHOOSE-AREA.michal-choose: For planting via Zoom only Tzora forest is available.
CHOOSE-AREA.golani-forester: Hi, I am the forest ranger David,
CHOOSE-AREA.golani-about: our planting center is located by the Gloani junction, a short drive from Tiberias, Haifa and Nazareth.
CHOOSE-AREA.tzora-forester: Hi, I am the forest ranger Eran,
CHOOSE-AREA.tzora-about: our planting center is located in the Judean foothills between Jerusalem and Tel-Aviv.
